Referential.SQLJoin: inner join dbo.TRADE t on t.IDT = tblmain.IDT
inner join dbo.INSTRUMENT i on i.IDI = t.IDI
inner join dbo.PRODUCT p on p.IDP = i.IDP
Referential.SQLRowState: case tblmain.IDSTACTIVATION when 'DEACTIV' then 'img=src:removed;title:Canceled entry' end

Condition.SQLWhere: ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR in ('ENTITY') and ACTORROLE.IDA in (select IDA from dbo.ENTITY)
